medical_history.chief_complaint: Nausea and bilious emesis for 2 episodes since the morning, associated with epigastric/RUQ discomfort radiating to the back.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began this morning at 9 am, with two episodes of bilious emesis. The discomfort in the epigastric/RUQ area has been present since then. The patient denies fever and reports experiencing cold sweats.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, DM 2, urinary incontinence requiring continuous bladder catheterization, history of right breast cancer status post mastectomy, cervical spine fracture.
